column4: hello, i have upgrade to Ubuntu 8.10, when trying to select Normal or Extra desktop effects i get the following error: "The Composite extension is not available." any ideas how to fix this problem?
: The driver is activated and currently in use.
not much... i use nvidia never troubleshutted ati's
: from a google search and a search in forums i get up that the solution is to install xserver-xgl .
well i thought that this wasn't neccesary anymore but i may be wrong
: but when i try to install it i get "E: Package xserver-xgl has no installation candidate"
if it's for all the files on the system ?
it will take a while with find...
you may want to try locate
